/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades painted in shades of white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of blue and green. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Trees line the sides of the road, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. Cars can be seen in the distance, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrant city life in Beijing.
